Interrupts.Name: Sacrifice
Interrupts.Trigger: An ally would take damage in range 6.
Interrupts.Effects: This character takes damage equal to 25% of their HP. That ally gains vigor 1 before the damage is applied.

Actions.Name: Open Wound
Actions.Description: An adjacent foe is marked. While marked, each time they dash (even as part of an ability), they take 2 piercing damage.
